Learn the basics of our Blackjack App

To start playing Blackjack, navigate to the main menu, click play, then the Blackjack icon. The layout simulates a casino table. The cards at the top of the screen are the dealer\'s hand. The cards on the bottom is your hand. Above each player\'s hands are their current hand\'s score. Below the hands there are your action buttons. At the bottom is the betting slider and current balance.

Blackjack allows for 6 different actions. Deal will start the game. It will deal two cards to both players. One card will be face-up from the dealer\'s hand and both your cards will be visible to you. Double will double your current bet. It is a double edged sword, almost literally. This button is only available when you have 11 or less in your hand. Hit informs the dealer to deal one more card to you. Be careful, only Hit when safe. Stay ends your turn and allows the dealer to deal cards to self-deal. Split when you have two of the same value cards in your hand you\'re able to split your hand in two.

The goal of the game is to achieve a hand score of 21, or at least a score better than the dealer. All numerical cards values are equal to their actual worth in-game. All face cards are worth 10. The odd card out is the Ace, it has a value of both 1 and 11. It\'s value is automatically adjusted during the game. That means if you have two face cards in hand and pull an ace, you would have a score of 21, not 31. Blackjack is ultimately a game of chance but with a bit of luck on your side victories will be normal place.
Clicking on the poker app shows the main poker screen.
